usage.cn: 做那些让你开心的事，和总使你微笑的人共处，像呼吸般多笑，如生命般恒爱。
usage.eng: Do what makes you happy. Be with who makes you smile. Laugh as much as you breathe. Love as long as you live.

usage.cn: 少些恐惧，多些希望，少吃点，多咀嚼，少些牢骚，多做深呼吸，少些闲聊，多说正事，少点恨，多点爱， 好东西都将会是你的。
usage.eng: Fear less, hope more,eat less, chew more,whine less, breathe more,talk less, say more,hate less, love more,and good things will be yours.
